bug.summary: After jumping once, the charactor will be stuck, and cant jump again.
bug.description:

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/breezeyuner>@breezeyuner</denchmark-link> , Thanks for pointing this issue out. We are working to fix this bug for the Feb 11 launch of the contest. See this related issue for a discussion of the behavior over reset: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/obstacle-tower-env/issues/20>#20</denchmark-link> .

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/breezeyuner>@breezeyuner</denchmark-link>
We just released v1.1 of the Obstacle Tower. This includes improvements to the timing of events in the animation system. I have attempted to reproduce this issue in the new system and have not been able to . As such I am closing the issue for now. If the issue still persists for you, please feel free to re-open.
